pkgmetadata.longdescription: Differential RNA Methylation Analysis with Quad-Negative-Binomial Model // We present QNB, a statistical approach for differential RNA methylation analysis with count-based small- sample sequencing data. The method is based on 4 independent negative binomial distributions, and with their variances and means linked by local regressions, respectively. Please don't hesitate to contact liulian19860905@163.com if you have any questions.
